column2: for dessert we had the chocolate creme pie
column3: with oreo crust.. mmmmm..... let me warn you
column4: it's very rich. So if you're a big chocolate fan
column5: it should be perfect. It came with a huge dollop of whipped cream on top
column6: which helped lighten the chocolate in each bite
column7: perfect for someone like me who can only do so much chocolate before getting sugared-out.
